conditions.c3: Gained First-Class Honours or equivalent qualifications in your first degree

title: Marion B. Sewer Distinguished Scholarship for Undergraduates

conditions.c1: Be a U.S. citizen, U.S. national or permanent resident at the time of application.
conditions.c2: Students with DACA status also are eligible.
conditions.c3: You are not foreign nationals in the U.S. on a visa.

title: The American Chemical Society Division of Analytical Chemistry Graduate Fellowship

conditions.c1: The applicant must be a full-time student working toward a PhD
conditions.c2: The applicant must have completed the second year of graduate study by the time the fellowship period begins
conditions.c3: Analytical chemistry must be a central part of the applicant's PhD thesis
conditions.c4: The applicant's research supervisor must be a member of the American Chemical Society Division of Analytical Chemistry.
conditions.c5: Only one nomination per research supervisor will be accepted.
conditions.c6: Nine-month fellowships may begin on June 1, July 1, August 1 or September 1, so applicants for nine-month fellowships must not complete their thesis research before March 1 of the academic year in which they have received an award.
conditions.c7: Summer Fellowships begin on June 1 of the calendar year, therefore applicants for summer fellowships must not have completed their thesis research before September 1 of a given calendar year.
conditions.c8: You are not previous 9-month fellowship recipients

title: Payette Sho-Ping Chin Memorial Academic Scholarship

conditions.c7: Be a current high school senior at the time of your application.
conditions.c8: Current college students are not eligible to apply
